This project aims to examine patterns of plant species richness in Ecuador using cleaned and raw species occurence data from the [Botanical Information and Ecology Network](https://bien.nceas.ucsb.edu/bien/) database.

To learn more about me and my research visit [my website](www.hazeljanderson.com).
